attributes.action: accept Khalid Miah's new found life and alias as FK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should cherish this gracious day by accepting the name 'FK' for Khalid Miah, it is of high importance to the fellows well being.
Kindest Regards.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
